data.name: Shelgon

attacks.name: Knock Away
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

data.flavorText: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.

attacks.name: Scrunch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Shelgon during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

abilities.name: Energy Guard
abilities.text: As long as Shelgon has any basic Energy cards attached to it, damage done to Shelgon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Granite Head
attacks.text: Damage done to Shelgon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance) during your opponent's next turn.

data.name: Shelgon

abilities.name: Energy Guard
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has any basic Energy attached to it, it takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: They lurk deep within caves—motionless, neither eating nor drinking. Why they don't die is not known.

abilities.name: Hard Protection
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to Shelgon by attacks from your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rock Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage.

data.name: Shelgon

attacks.name: Scrunch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Shelgon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Dragon Bump
attacks.text: If Shelgon has any basic Fire Energy and any basic Water Energy attached to it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

data.flavorText: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Shelgon.

attacks.name: Tight Jaw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.text: Any damage done to Shelgon by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.name: Shelgon

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.

data.name: Shelgon

abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.text: Any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.

data.name: Shelgon

attacks.name: Knock Away
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

data.flavorText: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.

data.name: Shelgon

attacks.name: Focus Energy
attacks.text: During your next turn, Shelgon's Protect Charge attack's base damage is 80.

attacks.name: Protect Charge
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Shelgon by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.

data.name: Shelgon

attacks.name: Raging Blade
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 more damage.

data.flavorText: They lurk deep within caves—motionless, neither eating nor drinking. Why they don't die is not known.

data.name: Shelgon

attacks.name: Hard Roll
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Shelgon lives deep within caves. It stays shut up in its hard shell, dreaming of the day it will be able to fly.

data.name: Shelgon

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: The cells within its shell transform with explosive speed, preparing it for evolution.
